text: Sabatierite (Cu6TlSe4) is a mineral found in the Czech Republic. It is named for the French mineralogist Germain Sabatier (born 1923).Mindat.org - SabatieriteWebmineral.com - SabatieriteHandbook of Mineralogy - Sabatierite == References == Category:Copper(I,II) minerals Category:Thallium minerals Category:Selenide minerals Category:Orthorhombic minerals
title: Sabatierite
